struct  Header

Detailed Description

This class is a chunk item that has customised flora data.

Note the drawing is performed by the Flora class; this chunk item simply loads and provides ecotype information where necessary. Not all chunks will have ChunkFlora items, and if a chunk does not have one, then the Flora in the chunk will be auto-generated.
